title: PODCAST | THE INTERVIEW: Meeting Trackers' scene-stealer – The cheeky truck driver Lourens played by Gerald Steyn
text:
PODCAST | THE INTERVIEW: Meeting Trackers' scene-stealer – The cheeky truck driver Lourens played by Gerald Steyn

Cape Town – In the first episode of The Interview we chatted with a Hollywood heavyweight and for our second episode, we take great delight in introducing a local rising star.

He was undoubtedly the scene-stealer in the premiere of M-Net's new show, Trackers and we simply had to find out who the man was behind the cheeky truck driver Lourens Le Riche. With his thick Afrikaans accent, sandals, and shorts Gerald Steyn snuck into our hearts and made us laugh.

Spoiler alert! He's just as entertaining in-real-life as on-screen.

Deon Meyer’s new TV drama Trackers airs Sundays at 20:00 on M-Net (DStv 101) and is also available on Showmax.
